nodes.text: Kidron was a planet located in the galaxy. During the Galactic Civil War, many Y-wing pilots trained on Kidron, soaring through its spectacular orange skies.

The planet Kidron was first mentioned in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons, which was included in the description of a cosmetic helmet customization labelled "Kidron Sunset," as part of a post-launch add-on in 2021. It was first mentioned in Star Wars Legends, in the  Roleplaying Game book Planets of the Galaxy, Volume Three, published by West End Games on September 1, 1993.
